participant_1.background:
I remember listening to Yo Gotti with my brothers in the car on our way to the beach.
I play the guitar because it is a good way to express myself and I enjoy the challenge of learning new songs.
I am a writer that is also sensitive to people's reactions to my work.
I love the outdoors and finding new ways to express myself.
i love to go to the beach.

participant_2.background:
I am close to my family, but I don't know if they would be accepting of my sexuality.
I'm a tea enthusiast who loves spending time with my family and friends.
I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job.
I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby.
I enjoy peaceful sports and my bike rides are relaxing.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! Just got back from a day at the beach.
That sounds lovely! I love the beach. Do you live near one?
Yes, I'm lucky enough to live about an hour from the beach.
That's awesome! I live in a landlocked state, so I don't get to go to the beach very often.
I'm sorry to hear that. I love going to the beach, it's so relaxing.
It does sound relaxing! I love the sound of the waves and the smell of the ocean.
Yes, that's the best part! I also love swimming and playing in the sand.
I love swimming too! I'm not very good at it, but it's still fun.
I'm not very good at it either, but that's part of the fun!
I'm glad to hear you're not perfect! That makes me feel better.
I'm glad we're on the same page.
